compound.name: Yosemitech Y4000 Multi-Parameter Sonde
compound.description:
Classes for the Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde.

Sensor Datasheet

  • Manual
  • Modbus Instructions

Note

The reported resolution (32 bit) gives far more precision than is significant based on the specified accuracy of the sensor, so the resolutions kept in the string representation of the variable values is based on the accuracy not the maximum reported resolution of the sensor.

Sensor Constructor

{{ YosemitechY4000::YosemitechY4000 }}

Example Code

The Y4000 Sonde is used in the menu a la carte example.

1#include <sensors/YosemitechY4000.h>
2
3// NOTE: Extra hardware and software serial ports are created in the "Settings
4// for Additional Serial Ports" section
5
6// NOTE: Use -1 for any pins that don't apply or aren't being used.
7byte y4000ModbusAddress = 0x05; // The modbus address of the Y4000
8const int8_t y4000AdapterPower = sensorPowerPin; // RS485 adapter power pin
9const int8_t y4000SensorPower = relayPowerPin; // Sensor power pin
10const int8_t y4000EnablePin = -1; // Adapter RE/DE pin
11const uint8_t y4000NumberReadings = 5;
12// The manufacturer recommends averaging 10 readings, but we take 5 to minimize
13// power consumption
14
15// Create a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sensor object
16YosemitechY4000 y4000(y4000ModbusAddress, modbusSerial, y4000AdapterPower,
17 y4000SensorPower, y4000EnablePin, y4000NumberReadings);
18
19// Create all of the variable pointers for the Y4000
20Variable* y4000DO =
21 new YosemitechY4000_DOmgL(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
22Variable* y4000Turb = new YosemitechY4000_Turbidity(
23 &y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
24Variable* y4000Cond =
25 new YosemitechY4000_Cond(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
26Variable* y4000pH =
27 new YosemitechY4000_pH(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
28Variable* y4000Temp =
29 new YosemitechY4000_Temp(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
30Variable* y4000ORP =
31 new YosemitechY4000_ORP(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
32Variable* y4000Chloro = new YosemitechY4000_Chlorophyll(
33 &y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");
34Variable* y4000BGA =
35 new YosemitechY4000_BGA(&y4000, "12345678-abcd-1234-ef00-1234567890ab");

classes.name: YosemitechY4000
classes.brief: The Sensor sub-class for the Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_DOmgL
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the dissolved oxygen concentration output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_Turbidity
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the turbidity output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_Cond
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the conductivity output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_pH
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the pH output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_Temp
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the temperature output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_ORP
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the electrode electrical potential output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_Chlorophyll
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the chlorophyll concentration output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

classes.name: YosemitechY4000_BGA
classes.brief: The Variable sub-class used for the blue green algae (BGA) concentration output from a Yosemitech Y4000 multiparameter sonde.

groups.name: Sensor Variable Counts
groups.description: The number of variables that can be returned by a Yosemitech Y4000

members.name: Y4000_NUM_VARIABLES
members.brief: Sensor::_numReturnedValues; the Y4000 can report 8 values.

members.name: Y4000_INC_CALC_VARIABLES
members.brief: Sensor::_incCalcValues; we don't calculate any additional values.

groups.name: Sensor Timing
groups.description: The sensor timing for a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

members.name: Y4000_WARM_UP_TIME_MS
members.brief: Sensor::_warmUpTime_ms; time before sensor responds after power - 1.6 seconds (1600ms).
members.description: This is the time for communication to begin.

members.name: Y4000_STABILIZATION_TIME_MS
members.brief: Sensor::_stabilizationTime_ms; the Y4000 is stable after 60000ms.
members.description: Y4000 Modbus manual says 60s; we find Cond takes about 40s to respond.

members.name: Y4000_MEASUREMENT_TIME_MS
members.brief: Sensor::_measurementTime_ms; the Y4000 takes ~4000ms to complete a measurement.

groups.name: Dissolved Oxygen Concentration
groups.description:
The dissolved oxygen concentration variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 0-20mg/L or 0-200% Air Saturation
  • Accuracy is ± 0.3 mg/L

{{ YosemitechY4000_DOmgL::YosemitechY4000_DOmgL }}

members.name: Y4000_DOMGL_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; dissolved oxygen concentration should have 2 - resolution is 0.01 mg/L.

members.name: Y4000_DOMGL_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; dissolved oxygen concentration is stored in sensorValues[0].

members.name: Y4000_DOMGL_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "oxygenDissolved".

members.name: Y4000_DOMGL_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "milligramPerLiter" (mg/L)

members.name: Y4000_DOMGL_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000DOmgL".

groups.name: Turbidity
groups.description:
The turbidity variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 0.1~1000 NTU
  • Accuracy is ＜5% or 0.3NTU

{{ YosemitechY4000_Turbidity::YosemitechY4000_Turbidity }}

members.name: Y4000_TURB_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; turbidity should have 2 - resolution is 0.01 NTU.

members.name: Y4000_TURB_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; turbidity is stored in sensorValues[1].

members.name: Y4000_TURB_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "turbidity".

members.name: Y4000_TURB_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "nephelometricTurbidityUnit" (NTU)

members.name: Y4000_TURB_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000Turbidity".

groups.name: Conductivity
groups.description:
The conductivity variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 1 µS/cm to 200 mS/cm
  • Accuracy is ± 1 % Full Scale

{{ YosemitechY4000_Cond::YosemitechY4000_Cond }}

members.name: Y4000_COND_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; conductivity should have 1.

members.name: Y4000_COND_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; conductivity is stored in sensorValues[2].

members.name: Y4000_COND_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "specificConductance".

members.name: Y4000_COND_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "microsiemenPerCentimeter" (µS/cm)

members.name: Y4000_COND_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000Cond".

groups.name: pH
groups.description:
The pH variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 2 to 12 pH units
  • Accuracy is ± 0.1 pH units

{{ YosemitechY4000_pH::YosemitechY4000_pH }}

members.name: Y4000_PH_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; ph should have 2 - resolution is 0.01 pH units.

members.name: Y4000_PH_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; pH is stored in sensorValues[3].

members.name: Y4000_PH_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "pH".

members.name: Y4000_PH_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "pH" (dimensionless pH units)

members.name: Y4000_PH_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000pH".

groups.name: Temperature
groups.description:
The temperature variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 0°C to + 50°C
  • Accuracy is ± 0.2°C

{{ YosemitechY4000_Temp::YosemitechY4000_Temp }}

members.name: Y4000_TEMP_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; temperature should have 1 - resolution is 0.1°C.

members.name: Y4000_TEMP_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; temperature is stored in sensorValues[4].

members.name: Y4000_TEMP_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "temperature".

members.name: Y4000_TEMP_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "degreeCelsius" (°C)

members.name: Y4000_TEMP_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000Temp".

groups.name: ORP
groups.description:
The ORP variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is -999 ~ 999 mV
  • Accuracy is ± 20 mV

{{ YosemitechY4000_ORP::YosemitechY4000_ORP }}

members.name: Y4000_ORP_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; orp should have 0 - resolution is 1 mV.

members.name: Y4000_ORP_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; ORP is stored in sensorValues[5].

members.name: Y4000_ORP_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "ORP".

members.name: Y4000_ORP_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "millivolt" (mV)

members.name: Y4000_ORP_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000Potential".

groups.name: Chlorophyll Concentration
groups.description:
The chlorophyll concentration variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 0 to 400 µg/L or 0 to 100 RFU
  • Accuracy is ± 1 %

{{ YosemitechY4000_Chlorophyll::YosemitechY4000_Chlorophyll }}

members.name: Y4000_CHLORO_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; chlorophyll concentration should have 1 - resolution is 0.1 µg/L / 0.1 RFU.

members.name: Y4000_CHLORO_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; chlorophyll concentration is stored in sensorValues[6].

members.name: Y4000_CHLORO_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "chlorophyll_a_b_c".

members.name: Y4000_CHLORO_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "microgramPerLiter" (µg/L)

members.name: Y4000_CHLORO_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000Chloro".

groups.name: Blue Green Algae Concentration
groups.description:
The BGA variable from a Yosemitech Y4000 multi-parameter sonde

  • Range is 0 to 100 µg/L or 0 to 100 RFU
  • Accuracy is ± 0.04ug/L PC

{{ YosemitechY4000_BGA::YosemitechY4000_BGA }}

members.name: Y4000_BGA_RESOLUTION
members.brief: Decimals places in string representation; bga should have 2 - resolution is 0.01 µg/L / 0.01 RFU.

members.name: Y4000_BGA_VAR_NUM
members.brief: Sensor variable number; BGA is stored in sensorValues[7].

members.name: Y4000_BGA_VAR_NAME
members.brief: Variable name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "blueGreenAlgaeCyanobacteriaPhycocyanin".

members.name: Y4000_BGA_UNIT_NAME
members.brief: Variable unit name in ODM2 controlled vocabulary; "microgramPerLiter" (µg/L)

members.name: Y4000_BGA_DEFAULT_CODE
members.brief: Default variable short code; "Y4000BGA".
